content: the pumpkin crochet dolls & toys designed by meemanan materials abbreviations 1 cotton soft fingering 4 ply 2 crochet hook 2 5-2 75 mm english thai us c-2 magic_ring magic_ring วงก้นหอย 3 2 black beads 6 mm 4 black embroidery thread chain chain โซ่ 5 yarn needle embroidery slip_stitch c slip_stitch เลื่อนห่วง ลห needle and scissors 6 fiberfill stuffing ควักธรรมดา single_crochet x single_crochet คธ size ~⌀6 x h2 5 cm increase v increase คธ เพิ่มห่วง gauge/inch 7 5-8 decrease a decrease คธ ลดห่วง skill level easy stem x 1 brown pumpkin x 1 orange round pattern sts round pattern sts 1 5x in magic_ring c 5 1 8x in magic_ring c 8 2-5 chain 5x c 5 2 chain 8x c 8 3 chain v *8 times c 16 fasten_off leave the yarn ~20 cm sew 4 chain 1xv *8 times c 24 to the pumpkin 5 chain 2xv *8 times c 32 leaf x 1 green 6 chain 3xv *8 times c 40 7 chain 4xv *8 times c 48 8-12 chain 48x c 48 13 chain 4xa *8 times c 40 14 chain 3xa *8 times c 32 chain 2xa *8 times c 15 24 stuffed 16 chain 1xa *8 times c 16 17 chain 8a c 8 fasten_off leave the yarn ~45-50cm assembly 1 crochet the pumpkin 2 crochet round 12 3 crochet follows round 1-7 the pattern until round 15 stuff fiber fill 4 round 17 fasten_off 5 wrap yarn around 6 repeat 5 times leave the yarn ~50cm outside of pumpkin and 8sts then reinsert yarn back through the center of the pumpkin 7 finished the pumpkin 8 sew the stem to 9 twist the leaf to the top middle of the make curly and sew pumpkin done thank you copyright © 2021 meemanan all rights reserved copyright ©2021 meemanan all rights reserved this pattern is an original design by meemanan this written pattern is for personal use only please do not sell or redistribute this pattern in part or in whole you may sell the finished product but please credit meemanan as the designer email meemanandotcom@gmail com line @meemanan | @meemanan
